The Seduction of Joe Tynan is a compelling story about an unlikely bond between a liberal Senator and a southern researcher. The plot is thought-provoking and will leave you with a deep appreciation for the complexities of human relationships.

Mr. Bean's Holiday is a delightful coming-of-age story about a mischievous character rediscovering the joy of life. The film features heartwarming moments and beautiful cinematography.

The Psychic Experiment is a mind-bending mystery that will leave you questioning the boundaries between reality and illusion. The film features a stellar cast and a unique visual style that will stay with you long after you finish watching.
